subject: p14992360
Findings: In comparison with the study of, there is increase in the left upper lobe consolidation accompanied by increased prominence of pulmonary vessels consistent with elevated pulmonary venous pressure. There is a possible small pleural line that could be reflection of a small apical pneumothorax on the right, there is suggestion of a vessel running beyond this line in the far apical region, raising the possibility that this could represent merely a skinfold.
